question:
Rearrange the following six sentences in proper sequence to form a meaningful paragraph, then answer the questions given below.
But, we all helped in the first few days.
Chandrapur is considered as a rural area.
Manohar was transferred to his office recently.
Initially he was not getting adjusted to the city life.
Now, Manohar is very proud of his colleagues.
Before that he was working in chandrapur branch of our office. Which of the following should be the third sentence ?
